title: Auction
desc:
Post 2415
- The host will show everyone a <:trinket:1141745128898310144> card.
- Every player choses a card from their hand to offer as a bid.
- Bids are only revealed once every player has submitted one.
- The highest post number wins. (Ties broken randomly.)
- The winner discards their bid card and draws the offered <:trinket:1141745128898310144> card.
